attributes.action: To not sack our Hero’s for not getting jabbed!
attributes.additional_details: I want them to reconsider and remember those they are forcing out of a job are also the same people who have worked hard all through our lockdown!
attributes.background: Reconsider that nurses &healthcare workers! Not be sacked April if not doubled jabbed!

rejection.details:
Prohibit employers from requiring staff to be vaccinated against Covid-19:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599841
